BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Itseez/opencv/blob/master/samples/cpp/tutorial_code/ml/non_linear_svms/non_linear_svms.cpp>https://github.com/Itseez/opencv/blob/master/samples/cpp/tutorial_code/ml/non_linear_svms/non_linear_svms.cpp</denchmark-link>
  line 131
 From:
 Mat sv = svm->getSupportVectors();
 To:
 Mat sv = svm->getUncompressedSupportVectors();
 
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Itseez/opencv/blob/master/samples/cpp/tutorial_code/ml/introduction_to_svm/introduction_to_svm.cpp>https://github.com/Itseez/opencv/blob/master/samples/cpp/tutorial_code/ml/introduction_to_svm/introduction_to_svm.cpp</denchmark-link>
  line 68
 <denchmark-h:h3>Please state the information for your system</denchmark-h>
 
 
 OpenCV version: 3.1.0
 
 <denchmark-h:h3>In which part of the OpenCV library you got the issue?</denchmark-h>
 
 samples/cpp/tutorial_code/ml/non_linear_svms/non_linear_svms.cpp
 line 131
 <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behaviour</denchmark-h>
 
 Show the support vectors
 <denchmark-h:h3>Actual behaviour</denchmark-h>
 
 Shows only one point in the left upper corner.
 <denchmark-h:h3>Additional description</denchmark-h>
 
 see also:
 <denchmark-link:http://answers.opencv.org/question/80296/svmgetsupportvectors-returns-wrong-answers/>http://answers.opencv.org/question/80296/svmgetsupportvectors-returns-wrong-answers/</denchmark-link>
